projects.title: GlotFiles
projects.description: This is the only online polyglot file generator, you can upload multiple files and it will be converted to a polyglot file.

projects.title: CollabEdge
projects.description: A Real-Time Collaborative Platform to collaborate on code, documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and more with your team.

projects.title: Web Penetration Testing Tool
projects.description: A web application to perform penetration testing on websites, providing actionable solutions for detected vulnerabilities.

projects.title: Amazon Lex Bot
projects.description: A custom chatbot for automated conversational interactions using AWS (Amazon Bedrock).

projects.title: Chicago Water Lead Levels Analysis
projects.description: Data analysis and visualization of lead contamination levels in Chicago's water supply, highlighting affected areas and suggesting solutions.

projects.title: Custom Shell CLI
projects.description: A shell/command-line interface built from scratch in C, incorporating essential terminal functionalities (tsh).
